trait.name: Aggressive
text: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: Black Sun Sight
text: Magical darkness doesn't impede the Black Sun orc's darkvision.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
text: While in bright light, the orc has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
text: The orc has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The orc makes two attacks with its greatclub or with its sling.

action.name: Greatclub
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sling
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
